title: Turquoise slayer helmet

properties.name: description
properties.value: The turquoise slayer helmet is a piece of equipment that is worn in the helmet slot. It is a cosmetic upgrade to the slayer helmet.

content:
This article is about the regular turquoise slayer helmet. For the imbued version, see Turquoise slayer helmet (i).
Turquoise slayer helmet
Released4 January 2018 (Update)
MembersYes

Item ID21888

The turquoise slayer helmet is a piece of equipment that is worn in the helmet slot. It is a cosmetic upgrade to the slayer helmet.

It can be created by adding Vorkath's head after purchasing the ability Undead Head for 1,000 Slayer reward points from any Slayer master. This is reversible, and the head will be returned to the inventory along with the slayer helmet's components. The head will be lost on death in PVP.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-6-2
 Defence bonuses
+30+32+27-1+30
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+0List

It can be created by adding [[Vorkath's head]] after purchasing the ability ''Undead Head'' for 1,000 [[Slayer reward point]]s from any [[Slayer master]]. This is reversible, and the head will be returned to the inventory along with the slayer helmet's components.
